description.p: Before leaving this topic, evaluate your ability to perform each of the following tasks.

likert_series.prompt: Selecting 1 means "I could do this not at all", selecting 3 means "I could do this while relying on the course material" and selecting 5 means "I could do this perfectly on an exam."

item.prompt: I can describe the solute differences between isotonic, hypertonic and hypotonic solutions.
I can describe the affect of an isotonic, hypertonic and hypotonic solution on the shape of a cell.
I can describe how osmotic pressure is generated and what conditions are necessary to create high osmotic pressure in a cell.
I can explain why the description of osmosis emphasizes the solvent changes.
